Room.Name: Main Ball Room
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the spacious ball room of a popular bawdy house.
Room.LongDescription: A loud and drunken party is taking place, and a piano is being played loudly in the corner of the grand room. A wide stairway leads upstairs, and a veranda runs around the entire outside of the house. Through the south french doors you see a view of the bay and a long dock where a pirate ship is moored. Most of the men are crew members from that ship.
